level.heading: Fees.
level.text: Any person filing a foreign judgment shall pay to the Clerk the fee established by the Superior Court. Fees for docketing, transcription, or other enforcement proceedings shall be as provided for judgments of the Superior Court.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 8-173, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 15-351.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon § 5 of the Uniform Enforcement of Foreign Judgments Act (1964). See 13 Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on WESTLAW.
